text: Tini balalena -- ''ami take kichute'i tomadera sathe pathaba na yataksana na tomara amara kache allah‌ra name oyada kara ye tomara niscaya amara kache take phiriye anabe, yadi na tomara ekanta asahaya ha'o.’’ Ata'eba tara yakhana tamke tadera prati‌sruti dila takhana tini balalena -- ''amara ya balachi tara upare allah‌i karnadhara.’’
